mapper.select: select userNo,userID,userPwd,userEmail,userJoinDate,managerClassification,userAddress,corpName,corpType,corpManager,phoneNo,creditStatus from Customer where userID=#{userID} and userPwd=#{userPwd} and rownum=1

select userID from Customer where userEmail = #{param2} and rownum=1
select userID from Customer where userID = #{userID}

mapper.update: update Customer set userPwd=#{userPwd}, userEmail=#{userEmail}, phoneNo=#{phoneNo} where userNo=#{userNo}
update Customer set creditStatus=2 where userNo=#{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into Customer ( userNo, userID, userPwd, userEmail, userJoinDate, managerClassification, userAddress, corpName, corpType, corpManager, phoneNo, creditStatus ) values ( userNo.NEXTVAL, #{userID}, #{userPwd}, #{userEmail}, SYSDATE, 0, #{userAddress}, #{corpName}, #{corpType}, #{corpManager}, #{phoneNo}, 0)
